name: 斯特凡诺斯·泰
name_full: 斯特凡诺斯·泰 Stefanos Tai
introduction: Stefanos Tai is a Chinese – Greek filmmaker raised by dancers in NYC.  he’s been recognized by festivals, universities, and the UN, and was a Tribeca Film Fellow, SFFILM Rainin Finalist, and was selected into HAF IDP and EAVE Ties that Bind.  he’s also an alum of the Google Creative Lab, and has received support for under-represented filmmakers from DCTV.  at his last position, Head of Film for TBWA Hong Kong, he began directing branded content globally.
